title: Maps 3D - GPS ipod.iphone.ipad
description:
Description
ÃƒÂ¢Ã‹Å“Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ÃƒÂ¢Ã‹Å“Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ÃƒÂ¢Ã‹Å“Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ÃƒÂ¢Ã‹Å“Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ÃƒÂ¢Ã‹Å“Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ Imagine a GPS app designed for all outdoor activities ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ the perfect companion for skiing, biking, hiking and riding. With geocaching built in and the option to plan, record and share your rides or routes.

And imagine that this app doesn't depict mountains and valleys as flat spots on a map, but in THREE DIMENSIONS ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ including the path you are traveling on. A precise (!) altimeter displays your current elevation at any time. That is Maps 3D.

How is this possible? We're the first company to combine NASA scans of the Earth's topography with THE outdoor map OSM.

You'll receive maps of the entire world at no extra cost. With every street, path, rise, track and trail on OSM. Follow or record routes, search functionality, altimeter and numerous features included. You can load free routes from Everytrail and other sources.

And the best part: Maps 3D is fun! Have a look at the images below and give it a try!

REVIEWS IN THE MEDIA

*** TOP 5 *** App Navigation in 25 countries (as of 01/2012)

"The functions are helpful; the compilation of the 3D maps is impressive." 
Macwelt.de - Score: 1.8
"This app lays the world at your feet, in 3D!" Bild.de Digital - Score: 4/5
"An app recommended for hikers, cyclists and horse enthusiasts..." iPhone & iPad apps in Test Magazine, issue 3/2011 - Score: 8/10
Computer Bild "Premium App of the Week" - issue 15/2011
CHIP.de - Score: 5/5


PRIMARY FUNCTIONS

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…Â¾Ã‚Â¤ LOAD MAPS IN ADVANCE over WiFi or 3G. No further Internet connection needed thereafter
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…Â¾Ã‚Â¤ RECORD ROUTES by GPS ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ coordinates and exact elevations are logged
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…Â¾Ã‚Â¤ EVALUATE ROUTES ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ all information on the trip with elevation and speed profiles
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…Â¾Ã‚Â¤ USE BIKE COMPUTER ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ all key tachograph data available at a glance
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…Â¾Ã‚Â¤ SEARCHABLE ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ towns, streets, mountain peaks, lakes and other natural POIs available offline


DETAILS

3D MAP DISPLAY:

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Accurate & precise relief map based on NASA scans of the Earth's surface
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Realistic 3D views from every perspective
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Contour lines on the topographical map
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ The compass always points to the destination (3GS and newer), with linear distance
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Constant depiction of own position on the map
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Improved safety through better understanding of terrain and easier orientation


TOURING AND ROUTE PLANNING:

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Simple trips can be loaded via iTunes, Everytrail, e-mail, URL or Dropbox
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Display of remaining distance and elevation
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Display of travelled distance, current and average speeds and height above sea level
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Deviations from route detected immediately
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Export trip: Share easily by e-mail
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Precise calculation of climbs/descents and climbing and descending speeds based on the 3D elevation model


WAYPOINTS:

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Set waypoints
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Target flag as marker with connecting line on map
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Online address search
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Geocaching fans can also use raw waypoint files


POINTS OF INTEREST - POIs (offline maps):

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ City and street names
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Mount peaks, lakes, beaches, forests, glaciers, caves


MAPS:

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Free OSM maps with cycling and hiking paths, horse trails, tracks and ski trails
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Three different scales
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Post GPS and map links via Twitter and Facebook
ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Global map material


GENERAL / NOTES

Background GPS recording can significantly cut battery life

What's new in Version 2.5
New: ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ 340 Skiing areas, ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Photo waypoints, ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ iTunes track exchange, ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ refined data display, ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ free camera angle

NEW IN VERSION 2.5:

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ 340 skiing areas including all the aerialways, pistes and cross-country ski runs from the OSM
Please check the availability of your favorite skiing area at www.openstreetmap.org 
(full version only).

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Photo waypoints
Add photos to every waypoint you create. They can be sent via email.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ iTunes track exchange
If your device is connected to iTunes drag and drop .gpx files easily.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Change camera angle
By stroking with two fingers in parallel up and down the camera angle changes from 2D to 3D seamlessly.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ The map view can be zoomed into by a double-click, zoom out by clicking once with two fingers.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Gradient and gradient speed (m/min or ft/min) is precisely calculated based on the terrain data

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Direction to destination is displayed in degree and orientation
To find your destination more easily a black and white line connects your position and the flag icon.


IMPROVEMENTS:

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Strongly improved terrain display

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Sharper and faster map display - especially on 3G and 3GS

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Full topographic details for the lower 4 zoom levels (iPhone 4 and above)

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ New terrain shading method to highlight details also on the 'sunny' side of mountains

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ New, better readable data display

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Scalebar in 2D map

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Dynamic, soft zooming behavior

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Pressing 'pause' interrupts the speed calculations, not only the recording

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Real duration and speed saved as extensions in .gpx files

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Tracklist ordered by date

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Separated zoom and rotate behavior to improve map handling

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ After zooming or rotating the map stays GPS centered

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ New menus for waypoint handling

ÃƒÂ¢Ã…â€œÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Compass events are damped to avoid unpleasant map surge
